description:
One way to Increasing one's happiness is through the power of positive thinking. That is one skill that this Udemy course will touch on to teach you how to be happier in your job.

With our Increasing Your Happiness course students will engage in effective ways to increase their happiness. This will have a positive impact on their personal and work lives. It will improve their communication skills, increase performance, and decrease absenteeism/turnover.

Most of us spend more time at work than we do engaged in any other activity other than sleeping. If we consider how much of our lives we spend in our workplace, it quickly becomes clear that spending this time unhappy, unfulfilled, and just counting the days until the weekend is a waste of time and energy. Finding ways to be happier at work can not only lead to better mental health, but can improve your productivity and overall work performance. One key way to cultivate more happiness at work is to plan for it! Develop habits that get your workday off to the right start, and youâ€™ll see greater happiness throughout the day and week.
title: Increasing Happiness In The Workplace
